item.description:
ok, let's try this again, last Saturday was a saturated wipeout with the rain, but on the bright side, trees and plants have to drink too. Right now the weather says its gonna be sunny and in 70. **bring helmet, water and snack and a sweater or jacket in case it's colder.

Park and Meet at the Canal Visitor Center, located at:
60 Ed Moffitt Drive
Sandwich, Ma 02563
508-833-9678
http://www.nae.usace.army.mil/recreati/ccc/recreation/recreation.htm

DIRECTIONS:
http://www.nae.usace.army.mil/recreati/ccc/recreation/viscentdir.htm
item.name: CapeCodCanal...let's try this again
